metadata.title: CVE-2020-25715 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in pki-core 10.9.0. A specially crafted POST request canbe used to reflect a DOM-based cross-site scripting (XSS) attack to injectcode into the search query form which can get automatically executed. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data integrity.

criterions.comment: dogtag-pki package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
